snippet: Jake LaMotta, the one-time middleweight champion whose life inspired the film "Raging Bull," is bringing back his show "Lady and the Champ," which chronicles his boxing career and the years that followed.
abstract: Jake LaMotta, the one-time middleweight champion whose life inspired the film "Raging Bull," is bringing back his show "Lady and the Champ," which chronicles his boxing career and the years that followed.

headline.main: Take That, Tyson: 'Raging Bull' LaMotta Brings 'Lady and the Champ' Back to the Stage
headline.print_headline: LaMotta Is Returning To Stage (but Not Ring)
